summary: A Redguard follower found in the Falkreath Dead Man's Drink Inn
descriptionHtml:
Description:-
This adds a Redguard named Elham to the Dead Man's Drink Inn. He has a good one-handed sword skill and block skills, so I suggest you give him a shield and sword.He is Essential so you don't have to worry about him dying on you. This was my first mod so he doesn't have a custom voice or a custom armor.As mentioned he will be found in the Falkreath Inn/Tavern

Lore:-

Elham was an Imperial veteran who lost his left eye in battle, and was branded the name "Desert Wolf" for his mercenary work in Hammerfell. He was then hired within the ranks of the Alik'r to hunt down rogue citizens from Hammerfell who have commited something wrong..

During one of his operations he accidentally killed one of his comrades and was set up to be a traitor to the Alik'r, so he escaped to Skyrim and is now resting in the Dead Man's Drink Inn in Falkreath, looking for an old friend who can help him redeem himself.

Recommended:-
Redguard Knight Armor by Hothtrooper44
Redguard Shield Standalone by Nroski
Tribal Scimitar by ImsumDave
The Eyepatch shown in screenshots is Bandit Eyepatch by Ceekay9
(http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1874/?)

Requrements:-
This mod requires Skyrim 1.9.32.1.0
Nothing else!

Installation:-
Download via NMM or manually
Extract and put the esp in the Data folder in SKyrim directory
Activate the mod in NMM
Play the game!

Uninstall:-
Be sure to take everything he had from you
Deactivate the file in NMM
Delete the esp
Bingo!

Be sure to give a kudos or endorse this mod if you like....
author: DrWolff
